text: Aldo Mirate (7 May 1943 â€“ 26 August 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Italian Communist Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1972 to 1979. Mirate died in Asti, Italy on 26 August 2022, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Piedmont Category:Italian communist politicians
title: Aldo Mirate
